actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.
Committee on Public Works discharged in Senate.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act to provide for the filing of certain supplemental information statements.

summary.text: Requires the filing of supplemental environment impact statements under the National Environmental Policy Act prior to preproduction exploration and production development of oil and gas lease sites on the Continental Shelf. States that such statements must include: (1) the specific environmental hazards associated with such exploration, development, and production; and (2) the specific measures which will be taken by the lessee and the Federal agency concerned to alleviate such hazards including those performance standards which will be applied with respect to any equipment used during such exploration, production, or development.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Environmental Policy Act to provide for the filing of certain supplemental information statements.
